desc: 攻撃時、確率で敵を怪我状態にする

dictionary.lore: There was a general who was especially skilled at wielding the Beast Spear. Having accomplished many great deeds while wielding this spear, the general was bestowed a special lance in thanks of his service. This lance was both crooked and oddly balanced for what it was. Because of this, those on the receiving end perceived it as slow moving, though in that very instant its blade would have already pierced deep into their body.

name: 鬼皇槍『毘沙門』
